reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Strengthening HIV Control in Uzbekistan: Continuing Scale Up of the Response to HIV in Uzbekistan, with Particular Focus on Most at Risk Population

description.narrative: Uzbekistan - HIV - Republican Center to Fight AIDS - RAC. This program has the following goals: The reduction of HIV-related morbidity and mortality in Uzbekistan. The objectives of this program are: To deliver evidence-based, integrated and regionally prioritised HIV prevention and treatment services to key populations groups at risk of HIV and living with HIV.. To support the development of national health infrastructure for sustained, relevant and optimal HIV response.. To strengthen community systems and support civil society to ensure needs-based, human rights and public health driven and sustainable HIV response with particular focus on key affected populations.

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for UZB-H-RAC
Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of HIV-positive registered TB patients given anti-retroviral therapy during TB treatment
Percentage of new HIV-positive patients starting IPT during the reporting period
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART, who have a suppressed viral load at 12 months (<1000 copies/ml)
Percentage of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
KP-other1: Percentage of PWID-women reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people who inject drugs that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of HIV-positive pregnant women who received antiretrovirals to reduce the risk of mother-to-child transmission
Percentage of HIV-positive women who received ART during pregnancy and/or labour and delivery
Percentage of infants born to HIV-positive women receiving a virological test for HIV within 2 months of birth
Number of needles and syringes distributed per person who injects drugs per year by needle and syringe programs
Percentage of MSM that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
TCS-Other 3: Percentage of PLHIV receiving psyho-social support
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Impact indicator for UZB-H-RAC
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
Estimated percentage of children newly infected with HIV from mother-to-child transmission among women living with HIV delivering in the past 12 months
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV
Outcome indicator for UZB-H-RAC
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a male partner
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting the use of sterile injecting equipment the last time they injected
